titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the rule providing for termination of disabled adult child's benefits upon marriage.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2675)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 3/10/1993--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to repeal provisions for the termination of a disabled adult child's insurance benefit upon his or her marriage.
